resources.string: It may take up to 30 seconds
Start with choosing default providers or scan a QR code to set up your own.
Allow Firebird to generate and store a strong password, you will be able to export it any time.
Option 1: provide email and password. Payment providers will know your email and will be able to provide assistance in case of password loss.
Option 2: provide BIP39 recovery phrase. Payment providers will know nothing about you, Firebird will only use your BIP39 phrase once to derive a payment key, will NOT store a phrase itself.
Note that Firebird will neither store a provided phrase nor use any standard derivation paths.\n\nEven if this wallet gets compromised the rest of funds attached to phrase will remain safe.
Everything is set up, the wallet is ready to be used. Thanks for choosing Firebird!

No matching account exists, here are possible reasons why:

- Incorrect credentials. Please make sure your email and password combination (or BIP39 recovery phrase) is exactly the same you used when creating a wallet.

- Missing payment provider. You could have used a provider which is not on default list, in that case please choose that provider by scanning its QR code and try again.

Account checking could not be performed, here are possible reasons why:

- Connectivity issues. Please make sure internet connection is available on your device and Firebird has permissions for network access.

- Unreachable payment providers. Remote provider services may be on maintenance at the moment, please try a bit later or contact provider support.
BIP39 phrase must be 12 words long
No authentication support on this phone
Authentication support is blocked at the moment, try again later
Register at least one authentication method in system settings
Orbot is not installed so Tor network can not be used right now. Further wallet progress has been halted because your settings require Firebird to be Tor-protected.
It is unclear whether Orbot can provide Tor services right now. Further wallet progress has been halted because your settings require Firebird to be Tor-protected.
Orbot has disconnected, halting an app
Suggest us what went wrong and we\'ll work on it!
How was your experience with us?
